reviewText: The contestants of the Long Beach championship fall so far below the standards set by contestants in mainland China it is laughable. If you're looking for a kung fu tournament, watch the National Championship from the People's Republic instead. Don't waste your money on the Long Beach championship.

For the most part its a good old boy home dvd I would love to see a dvd like this done in a documentary format. Instead of just few random features deemed in important only to the filmmaker such endeavors are a waste of time actually.
